Note.Description: - Fixed a bug which caused an exception on certain build states - Fixed a bug which caused to always reload the test results on finished builds, while a build from the same build definition was running
- Fixed problems with missing configuration settings after update
- Fixed problems with running builds on VSTS - Fixed problem parsing source version on Git repositories
- Added some key shortcuts (F1 about, F4 open servers, F5 refresh, F10 big size mode) - Fixed GitHub link in about
- Fixed bugs in full window width view
- Fixed bug which caused that notifications for builds which would propably fail not to show
- Support multi-select for tags (add & remove)
- Just refresh displayed builds + status for displayed builds
- Fixed a bug when opening build details with Edge - Added filtering with tags
- Added context ribbon menu
- Changed menu to ribbon - Added translation EN, FR, DE

- Get test result in small view and big view - Changed logic; all builds are fetched as list - Tooltip over running build shows what is going wrong - Minimizing main window doesn't minimize pinned builds
- Small bugfix when build is running and waiting
- Round corners for big screen - Value rounded on sliders for refresh interval and zoom factor
- Big size mode for fullscreen in settings - New view when in big size (tiles instead of gridview) - Zoom factor from 100 till 300% - Bugfix when there is no config
- Show filtered count + total count in settings view - Added release notes - Bugfix on TFS 2015 when build is not started
- Better compatibility with TFS 2015 - Settings view for TFS 2015 only needs root URL of TFS
- Build can be pinned
- Compatible with Windows 7 - Build queue für TFS 2015 Build vNext - More legend vor action icons
- Configured Clickonce
